title: Understanding Serotonin Syndrome
text: Serotonin syndrome is a serious condition that can occur when there is an excess of serotonin in the body. It is often caused by drug interactions.

title: Symptoms of Serotonin Syndrome
text: Common symptoms include agitation, restlessness, confusion, rapid heart rate, and high blood pressure. Recognizing these symptoms is crucial for diagnosis.
